title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Are you contagious? Here's when you're most likely to spread COVID, flu, RSV
items.description: How long are you contagious after getting COVID, flu, RSV, pneumonia and more? Here's what to know to keep others safe this holiday season.

items.title: Gaetz ethics report says his drug use, sex with a minor violated state laws
items.description: A report by the House Ethics Committee found former Rep. Matt Gaetz paid multiple women, including a 17-year-old girl, for sex.

items.title: Undocumented people are among most vulnerable to climate-infused disasters
items.description: Many undocumented people are not eligible for federal financial disaster aid and several remain fearful even when help is offered.

items.title: Health care AI, intended to save money, requires expensive humans
items.description: Despite the hype over artificial intelligence in medicine, the systems require consistent monitoring and staffing to put in place and maintain.

items.title: The new right celebrates Trump at a conservative conference and sidesteps inconsistencies

items.description: A firefighter dressed as Santa abseils down a bridge in Guatemala City to give gifts to children.

items.title: Slovak PM meets Putin in unannounced Moscow visit

items.title: Watch: 90-year-old with Parkinson's enters weightlifting contest

items.title: Honda and Nissan announce plans to merge
items.description: Honda and Nissan have announced plans to merge, forming world's third-largest automaker by sales as the industry transitions away from fossil fuels.

items.title: Watch: BBC reporter returns to childhood home destroyed in Syria civil war
items.description: Feras Killani grew up in Yarmouk in Damascus, which saw brutal fighting between rebel and government forces.

items.title: Woman dies after being set on fire on New York subway
